name: lobster Pot
description: Scans every git push to an organisation to find unwanted secrets

GITHUB_PRIVATE_KEY_1.description: The private key associated with the GitHub App

GITHUB_ORG_1.description: The name of the GitHub organisation to scan

GITHUB_SLACK_APPID_1.description: The Slack App ID corresponding to the GitHub App #1

SLACK_CHANNEL_1.description: The Slack channel to post to

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET_1.description: The Slack signing secret for this app

SCANNER_TYPE.description: The type of scanner to use, either 'binary' or 'golang'

SCANNER_NAME.description: The name of the scanner to use. Out of the box support for 'semgrep' and 'wraith'

SCANNER_BINARY.description: If using the 'binary' type, path to the scanning binary

SCANNER_ARGUMENTS.description: If using the 'binary' type, arguments to pass to the scanning binary
